website_summaries.verdict: The aviator style of these sunglasses is a classic Gucci shape at a reasonable price point for the brand.
pros: Resin frame with polycomposite lenses will stand up to rough treatment, giving these sunglasses a good level of longevity
You'll receive 100% UV protection with these lenses
Aviator style sunglasses have a look and lens shape that many people love
Less expensive than some other Gucci sunglasses options
cons: Sunglasses run smaller than you might expect

customer_reviews.title: Very Authentic.
customer_reviews.text: Very authentic, came with Gucci authenticity card, Gucci case, and makes me look like million bucks! I love amazon, great buys and great prices.

customer_reviews.title: 100% fake
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, let me emphasize to you that these are 100% FAKE. - They feel cheap, the "G" on the sides of the frames fades off, and the screws pop out after 1-2 months. - The ONLY satisfaction that I got from them is that people often complimented me on them after the first 1-2 weeks that I had them and then it all went downhill from there! 100% FAKE

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical of ordering glasses online! Especially reading everyone's reviews but I took the chance and I am completely satisfied with mine! I had my own pair that I purchased in a department store but I lost them on vacation. When my glasses arrived by mail, I was so nervous to open the box! My mouth dropped, it was the exact same glasses!!! No difference!! Brand new and not a scratch on them!!! Just make sure when you order your glasses, order from someone who has no bad reviews! You're going to spend a few extra dollars but it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pelayo

customer_reviews.title: Gucci Havana Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice aviator type design however I expected a much larger frame. These sunglasses are advertised as men sunglasses.The 59mm lens are more suitable for women. I would have preferred a 61mm lens instead. if there is a 61 mm lens in this design I will purchase again. I had the item returned because it was too small a fit and did not fit well.

product_meta.title: Gucci 1627/S Aviator Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Gucci Sunglasses style GG1627 is a plastic aviator with contrast detailing on the double bridge. The Rx-able GG1627 features a saddle nose bridge and adjustable wire core temples for maximum comfort. The temples feature the Gucci Sunglasses logo. Gucci Sunglasses have lightweight scratch/impact-resistant lenses.
